Tag_Imageneed.description: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — [[Legacy of the First Blade]]

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra, at the behest of Natakas, looked into a few leads that could help unveil the Pactyas (Ancients)|Huntsman's whereabouts.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' - 'Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted'

General_Description: '''Hunting the Huntsman''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra spoke to [[Natakas]] to start the hunt for the [[Pactyas (Ancients)|Huntsman]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' - ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Hunted]]''
